name: Merge Design: Mansion Makeover
summary: Merge Design is a very interesting casual merge game that combines decoration design, simulated construction and elimination gameplay to provide players with novel game content and gameplay designs. Here you can experience a completely different casual gameplay and feel your own merge challenge! Free choice of reward tasks, more surprise gifts, exclusive customize the appearance of the house, merge items to create a personalized living style, let's start renovating your own mansion!
